Reviews.Title: “Labor Day Weekend Getaway”
Reviews.Author: sideofc
Reviews.Content: The best thing about this place is the location. It was right on the beach and walking distance to the pier, bandstand, restaurants and shopping. We parked the car on Friday & did not move it until Monday. Now as to the hotel, we got a room on the 1st floor, the refridgerator made such a loud noise that we had to unplug it. The room smelled so bad that we had to request another room. The guy at the front desk was very helpful and gave us a room on the 3rd floor which was a suite. He said that he was going to get the additional charge waived. He also admitted that the rooms on the 1st floor did smell funny because we were so near the ocean. The 3rd floor was nice and bright. There was still a funny smell but not as bad as the 1st room. As to breakfast, it was food. The attendant was not very friendly. I stuck to the coffee and waffles because we prepared them ourselves. The price was very reasonable considering the location. By the way, they did not waive the additional charge because the clerk wrote down that the reason we were transferred to another room was because we claimed that the 1st room was too small, which was not true. Will we stay in this hotel, again? "No!"

Reviews.Title: “Roaches!!!!!!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: ShannonBrit
Reviews.Content: Roaches, roaches, roaches!!!!! They were verying sizes, everywhere. On the beds, in the beds, crawling in the walls, in the toilet seat, on the counter, nightstand, in drawers, on our bags, on our clothes, on our toiletries. I reached into my purse and a roach crawled out and when I dumped it out two more were in there. This was a one night stay in the roach motel hell! I called the front desk and a man with a heavy northern accent told me they were Palmetto bugs. Once I told him I am a native Floridian and definitely know the difference he became agitated and said ok, ok, ok. There is no where else I can put you, nothing I can do. I can't sleep as I got up in the middle of the night and one was under me! I have 3 sleeping kids 12 months, 4 years and 7 years and can't wake them in the middle of the night. This is an infestation of filth.

Reviews.Title: “Boardwalk Inn August 22 and 23 2012”
Reviews.Author: SuziieQ
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Boardwalk Inn Room 102 oceanfront suite for a getaway. It was awesome. Michael at the front desk was such a pleasure and sooooo helpful. The room was 1st floor over looking the pool with table and chairs. Quiet, clean and calming..LOVED IT!

Reviews.Title: “This place is a JOKE!!”
Reviews.Author: MrsGrutzius
Reviews.Content: This place is a mess!! Starting with the staff!! Rude and unprofessional!! The lady at check in was so rude I was surprised she had a job!! She never gave us a single smile nor told us a single bit of information about the hotel!! She was nasty and unprofessional!! The hotel was dirty in every way!! The pool was old and the mushroom didn't work! The bathtub didn't drain and the room smelled so bad like mold we had to keep the windows open the entire time!! I have seen nicer youth hostiles!! I have since written 2 emails to the hotel manager with no response and called to have a desk guy be a total smart*** to me!! So I can say I would never go back nor recommend this dump to anyone!!

Reviews.Title: “Could have been better”
Reviews.Author: P H
Reviews.Content: Overall the hotel was in need of some cleaning - it just felt a bit neglected. The brochure at the front desk touted newly renovated rooms and a free hot breakfast. The room was not as clean as I would have liked and looked tired. The drain plug in the bathtub did not work, the toilet paper holder fell off the wall and there was no toilet lid so you had to be careful about things getting dropped into the toilet. The room was a bit musty so it kicked in my allergies. The "hot breakfast" was cold cereal, greasy bacon and sausages, rubbery scrambled eggs, waffles and pastries. Something healthy would have been nice such as oatmeal and fruit instead of nothing but sugars and carbs. When we walked to the beach, the pool looked quite nice but the hot tub looked dirty. On the plus side, the view from the room was awesome although we probably would not stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Horrible -- close to beach”
Reviews.Author: Vieraeveedhnick
Reviews.Content: Walking down to the beach was the best thing about this hotel. We booked for 5 days and left in 2 days. We just signed out. Dirty rug. No toilet seat top. Nasty shower curtain. In one word horrible. Leave it to the college kids on spring break. Did I forget to mention the ANTS! !!! NEVER AGAIN WILL WE STAY THERE. ON THE ROAD ON I-4 TO A HOTEL AT CLEARWATER BEACH

Reviews.Title: “Nice Location but bad service in the breakfast room.”
Reviews.Author: Lisa S
Reviews.Content: This hotel is very nice, But the service in the breakfast room is very rude. The way I see it if you have one person bring down your bussiness you need to get rid of them.

Reviews.Title: “Good place to stay”
Reviews.Author: Kimberly B
Reviews.Content: We stayed a week ........room was comfortable and service was nice.....location was great......we love daytona.......

Reviews.Title: “Nice Location”
Reviews.Author: TNTraveler4
Reviews.Content: Location would be the big plus for this hotel. The key word here is hotel ,so don't expect a resort and you will be fine. The beds were very comfortable and the room was very clean! I was cautious after reading about bugs online, however we saw the bug man working onsite and never encountered a single bug. We were very pleased with the size of our oceanfront suite and the quietness of room. The beach music from the neighboring hotel disturbed my husband's afternoon nap, but I kind of enjoyed the sound. The front desk folks are wonderful and the breakfast folks are just the opposite(Jamaicans who are not happy in their work). Only parts of the breakfast are edible...definately skip the eggs! Waffles are good as I suppose the Raisan Bran and Fruit Loops are.Bring your own fruit and you will be good. Price was good for the room size. The grounds need to be spiffed a bit.

Reviews.Title: “Location great...the hotel not so much...”
Reviews.Author: Posted by an Easytobook.com traveler
Reviews.Content: If location is important to you, then this is the hotel for you. However, room service, room perks, etc. are not up to par in comparison to hotels with similar pricing. We won't be staying here again. This hotel is more for the average spring breaker.

Reviews.Title: “So so”
Reviews.Author: Gebradford
Reviews.Content: Good price but quality not as good as represented online. Little run down! Mattresses are horrible! We ate free breakfast first morning and then never again! Muffins were gross, eggs even worse, bacon/sausage even worse!!! The breakfast made my husband and oldest son sick of so we missed out on our first day at beach! !! Overall not impressed .......it will be our last stay at boardwalk inn!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel for the money”
Reviews.Author: Simon354
Reviews.Content: Payed 110 bucks for a sea view on 3rd floor, lovely room with 2 queen beds. Great pool and access to the beach in an ideal location on Daytona beach.

Reviews.Title: “Great!!!!!!!!!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: fayte f
Reviews.Content: It was a nice trip! Hotel was great! I stayed in a suite that had 2 king beds and a sofa bed! It also had a lounge! Its breakfast area is off the hook it has a wafflemaker,cereal,eggs,bacon,and u know your everday breakfast meal!U can even eat out side! We are even staying in it this year!

Reviews.Title: “Great location and large rooms”
Reviews.Author: melindamccrady
Reviews.Content: We had a beach front room that overlooked the pool and it was clean, comfortable, and huge! It looks like the rooms are being renovated, but ours was already done and it looked pretty good. There was a fridge and microwave, along with a big flatscreen tv. Lots of room for two people. A hot breakfast is included - bacon, sausage, icky scrambled eggs, waffles, toast, muffins, etc. The thing I didn't like about our room was the lack of a safe. Also, I would have loved a balcony! But the location is great, the pool area is nice, and the room was above average.

Reviews.Title: “Great value, friendly staff and right on the beach!”
Reviews.Author: MissAmyYa
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Boardwalk Inn and Suites for 4 nights after spending some hectic days in Orlando. The location was great, right on the beach. We did have a car on hire so it was easy to get around but one night we took a stroll down to the busier area where there were lots of souvenir shops nearby. The rooms were large, clean and had everything we needed. We were a party of 14 and they managed to accommodate us well and, at our request, our 5 rooms were all on the same floor next to each other. I stayed in a suite which consisted of two large double beds, a sofa bed and lounge area. This provided great space, especially if you have young kids. My 2 year old cousin was able to run around. The other rooms had less space without the lounge area but was still great and each room came with a microwave, fridge and coffee making facilities. I walked pass one room that had a kitchen!! The staff were incredibly friendly and let us check in early to those rooms that were ready, at no extra cost. They were also helpful in directing us to good places for lunch. We tried to obtain a free upgrade to the honeymoon suite for my newly wedded uncle and aunty but they wouldn't allow it and only offered it with the standard charge. The hotel has a pool that faces the beach which was clean and quiet. The only down side was the lack of parasoles/umbrellas for my family who liked to sit in the shade. It was also very very windy by the beach but that's no fault of the hotel - it was mid April. The pool water was incredibly cold though and the jacuzzi was far too hot! Breakfast was included and provided hot beverages, muffins, bagels, spreads and hot food. I wasn't a fan of the hot breakfasts and their cereal was limited. However, the bagels and cream cheese was a hit with me! Opposite the hotel is Tailgaiters which provides food, pool tables, a bar and karaoke which was good entertainment for our big group and only a stumble away. All in all, good value and I'd recommend it. Nothing fussy or fancy about this hotel but just what we needed.

Reviews.Title: “Rm313 for the price, I expected more.”
Reviews.Author: JillAdkinson
Reviews.Content: I expected a lot more for my money. I work hard for my money, RM313 had mildew on the shower curtain, clumps of hair in the towel, mold under the sink, no lid on the coffee pot where the water goes, one of the cups was open, no trash cans, no ice bucket, no ice in the machine anyways, the breakfast wasn't great, not for the price of the room. The bed was the only thing good, I didn't wake up with a back ache.

Reviews.Title: “Roaches, Roaches ans more Roaches”
Reviews.Author: Dennis H
Reviews.Content: My wife and recently stayed one night at this property. Not only were the rooms dirty, but after the lights went out at night, it was like being in the middle of a creepy roach movie. There were so many roaches that you could not count them. When I contacted the front desk about the problem they were of no help at all. The staff acted as if they were not concerned. I have notified the Volusia County Health Dept. and filed a complaint. Do not waste you hard earned money here.

Reviews.Title: “First time to Daytona”
Reviews.Author: mdanny
Reviews.Content: I have never been to Daytona so fing a place to stay was like throwing a dart, I opted for this place because it seemed centrally located, located at the corner of Speedway blvd and Atlantic ave everything we needed is right within walking distance, gift shops, restaurants and pubs. the Ocean Deck was our favorite, about 1/8 mile walk north on the beach.you just have to walk and look around kept finding new places, The rooms were very nice and comfordable, we had a "city view" room but still allowed a small view of the ocean, there was some traffic noise but as soon as you put the room fan on low you could not hear it. The staff was very nice and could answer many of my questions. The pool was large and went from 3ft at shallow to 10ft at deep end, there is also a hot tub, and lots of lounge chairs on the pool deck,you can also walk right down off of the pool deck onto the beach and there is a foot was at the stairs for when you return. The breakfast consisted of scrambled eggs,sausage,bacon, waffles and assorted breads items,your coffee and juices. Down lower you will notice that I clicked yes on the airport transportation, this is a cab that theclerk at the front desk will be happy to call and set up a time for you.

Reviews.Title: “Clean rooms with everything for a budget”
Reviews.Author: Brian O
Reviews.Content: I decide to move from 5 star accommodating down the road just for one night, found this on the internet special $72 US Dollars including american continental breakfast and tax. Glad I didn't pay full price. The whole area where this hotel is located has an unsafe feel about it, dropping from 5 star to the Boardwalk Inn was let down for me. The positive is that the rooms are clean and the staff are great to talk to. The downfall is that the noise of people walking past my room on a concrete floor was more that distracting I must say. Again I really must point out that I can only assume Americans find this type of accommodation acceptable.

Reviews.Title: “If you like bugs - this place is for you!”
Reviews.Author: Andrea K
Reviews.Content: Stayed there for only one night, and found a TON of bugs crawling around. All over the curtains, beds and the nightstand by our pillows. Looked like small roaches. The hotel provided ZERO compensation, and they were actually quite rude about it. So if you are cool with bugs crawling on you in your sleep and getting in your luggage to bring home... then enjoy :)

Reviews.Title: “Did not honor online advertised rate and then cancelled the rooms!”
Reviews.Author: Wa3whlr
Reviews.Content: Me and some of my friends booked some rooms for Daytona Spring Bike Week at $99/night online (separately). Of course this is an excellent rate. This was their ADVERTISED price. Two days later, we all received a cancellation via email with no explanation. Actually, they said they "received" our cancellation which is false. When we contacted the hotel, they said it was canceled according to two different stories (one was a computer glitch and one was their internet company who apparently didn't keep the site updated). Acccording to the hotel, they have fired the internet company. With two different excuses, it sound suspicously like someone at the hotel screwed up and would NOT honor the advertised rate! Then to add insult to injury, the guy (Dev) said he would be happy to book a room for us at $189/night. HELL NO! We all are avid bikers and go to Daytona for bike week - needless to say, they've lost our business for good!

Reviews.Title: “Location, location location”
Reviews.Author: Maurice C
Reviews.Content: This hotel is right on Daytona Beach. It's ideal if your attending Bikeweek or Biketoberfest. The facilites are good. Rooms are reasonable.It has a decent pool and a free continental breakfast. Ask for a poolside suite. We paid an extra $20 per night and it was worth the extra to get a ground floor suite with more space and cooking facilities

Reviews.Title: “Frustrating”
Reviews.Author: travel5Mississauga
Reviews.Content: Went to check out a room at this hotel after 1 night at LaQuinta. Front desk had the maid clean one for us and said it was "all new" since they renovated months earlier. Had a queen suite with oceanview. Lacks storage/drawers. Room wasn't bad but sofa bed was horrible. There were 5 of us so someone had to sleep in it. Had maintenance look at it and he (not very friendly) said they were all like that. Front of it sloped down. Bathroom VERY tight and not that clean. Toilet didn't flush well. 1st time I called no one available to come. 3rd day they came and fixed it. Knob on light switch missing. No kleenex provided. Any time we needed towels or toilet paper we had to go get it. They would never bring anything to the room. All except 1 or 2 lounge chairs by the pool were broken. Could only lie down, not sit up. So I sat on the concrete & leaned against the railing. No beach towels provided. Mushroom waterfall wasn't working. Breakfast not great. Mostly bread stuff. No yogurt or fruit, not even oranges. Arrived at 9:30 one morning (finishes at 10am) asked for more bacon and eggs and she said there weren't any more. Went to front desk. Manager said, "Well maybe they don't have any more". Didn't seem to care. Fitness centre consisted of 1 treadmill, 1 stairclimber and 1 bike in small room. Lobby nice. Nice kitchen preparation area in room. Floor edges not that clean. Dusty furniture. Don't think everything was new. Wouldn't return. OK for teens.

Reviews.Title: “RUDE RUDE RUDE!”
Reviews.Author: BB217
Reviews.Content: I went with a group of friends to stay for a long weekend and had nothing but problems... First, we booked a suite, which was decent except our pull out couch had dirty sheets on it when we got there. Also a suite sleeps 6 people, but even with booking a suite, they only allow for parking of 1 car. (most cars don't seat 6 people! certainly not with luggage too!) So we had to park 1 car 2 blocks down the road in a parking garage so it would not get towed! (THEY WOULDN'T BUDGE ON THIS POLICY AT ALL, EVEN THOUGH THERE WERE PLENTY OF OPEN PARKING SPACES AND THE HOTEL WASN'T COMPLETELY BOOKED!) The 2nd night when we came back to the hotel, we were locked out of our room and after calling the front desk, he said, "Are you sure there isn't anyone else in the room, because sometimes if the deadbolt is locked on the inside, the keys won't work." I said, "I'm sure. We are all in the hallway locked out!" He was still persistent and said again, "Are you sure there isn't someone in the room, because sometimes we bring a master key, unlock the door and then you remember there WAS someone in the room." So rude, like he didn't believe us. So I said, "YES. We are ALL standing in the hallway, and there BETTER NOT BE anyone else in OUR room!" Finally after arguing with him for several minutes, he came up and unlocked our room. The location of the hotel I had thought would be a good area since it is close to the Hilton and the Plaza but definitely NOT a good area! across the street were several shady looking bars and places, definitely not a place to be at night. Overall, very dissatisfied with our stay, and will probably not come back to Daytona Beach!

Reviews.Title: “loved it very friendly staff”
Reviews.Author: beccazoll
Reviews.Content: when I called to book the hotel the manager asked what time I thought I would be arriving I told him around 10 in the morning. Because we wanted to get to the beach. He told me to come in when I got in and he would give me a parking pass so I wouldnt have to pay for parking. When we showed up he sent us upstairs to enjoy breakfast before they closed. He gave us a parking pass and told us he would call as soon as our room was ready. Then checked on us while we were eating to tell us he wanted to give us a room until ours was ready....(very nice) Just incase my husbands parents wanted to sleep before our room was ready or so we could change our clothes ( this was way above and beyond what I would expect from a hotel) He then called us when our room was ready because we had a suite on the bottom floor (He let us check in super early). Anything that was needed he went above to help out with. I would stay here again. We had a great get away....

Reviews.Title: “Somewhere in the middle....”
Reviews.Author: bryanfanning
Reviews.Content: There are almost as many "terrible" reviews as "excellent." I'm somewhere in the middle. Upfront, you can't beat the location of this hotel. We stayed in a pool front room and could simply walk through our "patio" and be on the beach in a few minutes. Location was the best thing about the hotel. Fot $150/night, you're only paying for location. The hotel, in general, is a bit run down and not well kept. The maid service was lacking. During our entire week there, they never replaced the used coffee bags or shower soaps. We always had to ask for more. I did feel that they did a good job at vacuuming and making the beds. There were also many broken items in the room - handle to patio door, handle to the bedside table, etc. Signs of normal wear and tear that weren't given any attention. The breakfast was fair and included in the price, so it's hard to knock it. My kid liked the do-it-yourself waffles and cereals. Overall, I'd stay here again simply for the location, but only if I got a poolside room again.

Reviews.Title: “Depends on what you need in a motel”
Reviews.Author: jim_bowler
Reviews.Content: The room was clean but not a true suites motels. The two double beds both had one side up against a wall. The tub was rusty. Carpet was in good condition. Definitely easy access to the Atlantic Ocean. Amenties/toiliteries were samples in foil packs. One small flat screen TV in the "living room" area, older Philco in the bedroom area. The sofa bed is HORRIBLE thin mattress with springs you can feel, equivalent of sleeping on a bed of nails. The breakfast was so-so but for the crowd that was staying there it was probably breakfast at Tiffany's. This is not an extravagant hotel by a long shot, it is bare bone roof over your head, plan on spending a lot time at the beach or other activities. I will admit though the staff was very accommodating in getting more towels and moving cars in the parking lot a they double park cars in the lot so you have to leave your keys with the front desk if block someone in. If your not fussy about your accommodations this is the place, I would opt for the Hilton just north of it next time or try the Port Orange area for a nicer location. Our room was 212

Reviews.Title: “Management was "GREAT"”
Reviews.Author: jsmit25
Reviews.Content: We just got back from our 4 day visit to Daytona. I must say this hotel was hands down much cleaner than another hotel we wasted 2 nights at down the road. Front desk was extremely kind and allowed us to reserve a room the night before. The room was huge, 2 rooms, kitchen and nicely remodeled including a flat screen. pool was clean, location was good. No complaints what so ever. Found us a new place in Daytona, will definately reccomend to family and friends.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Hotel, Awesome Deal ...much better than the chain hotels”
Reviews.Author: ragrissom
Reviews.Content: Please read this review as it seems the previous reviews were for the hotel before a major restoration/new ownership. This hotel was an amazing deal! I stayed one night as i was passing through from Orlando, as I was at first was skeptical with the mixed reviews. I thought it was a gamble at first but the GM was very nice and said that if I didn't like the room he would refund my money. After getting to the room i was very happy as soon as i stepped inside. 79.00 for a queen with a side ocean view! There was a flat screen tv on the wall and the bedding/ mattress was brand new (i was told of a total redo of the property was done in Feb2011). Razor, spa soap, toothpaste included! I would recommend this property to anyone and hope that this review will serve as a basis for someone looking into this property! I am a manager myself so my attention to detail is very high! Check it out!

Reviews.Title: “Would Highly Reccomend”
Reviews.Author: 2LAZYINFL
Reviews.Content: I dont know why this place is getting bad reviews! Maybe they have remodeled or changed management since then becuase this pleace was amazing. From the minute we walked in the staff was pleaseant and helpful. Everything was clean and inviting. Our room was oceanfront by the pool and it too was updated, clean and comfortable. I am looking forward to many visits back!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent stay for our group!!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: cheermoomxoxoxo
Reviews.Content: I am not sure what all the negative post are about but we stayed at this hotel for 2nights with a big group of 60 rooms .. The stay was great !!! , the rooms were clean and renovated the pool area was soooo nice the continental breakfast was fine the parking was a little difficult at time but that was because we had such a large group we were very happy and will stay next year .. this hotel has not been open long and really can only improve . Roaches and dirty that is simply not true!!! Thanks to the staff they were great in accomodating a bunch of cheerleaders and parents !!!!!

Reviews.Title: “HORRIBLE, HORRIBLE, HORRIBLE!!! ROACHES, UNCLEAN ROOMS, LIST GOES ON!”
Reviews.Author: Florida1990
Reviews.Content: Do not stay here!! They did not clean my room, there were two roaches in my room!! When I tried to speak to management they would do nothing about this!! I would highly advise to anyone not to stay at this hotel!! Horrible, horrible experience!!!

Reviews.Title: “Absolutely the worst service and experience!!”
Reviews.Author: deige1117
Reviews.Content: I called for a rate, when I arrived I was checked and told "parking is full, so park along the street, in the public ramp, or at the empty lot a block over" It is a small parking facility and there was absolutely no spots so we drove to look for parking, we made a circle and spot in the lot opened...we parked which blocked another vehicle (which is how it is designed) and took the keys to the front desk, it was at this time I was told the lot is "reserved" for an event group and we couldn't use the lot. I went to unload my items to the room, my husband tipped a valet to move the vehicle to an appropriate area. Later the valet brought us our keys, he had moved our vehicle to a front row (not blocking any vehicles) I asked him if we needed to move it again to the road if it opens up, and he said "No, you are all set there" My vehicle then was towed in the night. It cost $125 cash to get my vehicle from the towing company. Of course no manager comes in before check-out. We waited and TRIED to talk to the manager who was extremely rude and could of cared less that his staff mis-led us twice (once at the front desk, and the valet) He wouldn't even listen and kept saying it was not his problem it was ours. He said we received a discount rate due to no parking to begin with?!?! I tried asking him how would I know what his "normal" rate is, I was quoted a price and that's what I was charged. He said we tried scamming the by paying off the valet??? It's policy to tip a valet, they also have a sign posted in the lobby to give your keys to the valet, my husband pointed out these signs that are posted all over their lobby, and this EXTREMELY unprofessional manger became loud and aggressive and said he was telling us to leave now, so we are trespassing and asked "Do you want me to call the police?" We said yes actually, we feel we're being scammed. He turned his back and went into his office cubby and wouldn't come out. He was rude and unprofessional the entire time. I have never been treated this way as a customer paying for a service, it was absolutely unbelievable!!

Reviews.Title: “New Management is Doing an AMAZING Job!”
Reviews.Author: L0ve_My_B0ys
Reviews.Content: Recently renovated, so the room was clean as a whistle. We thought we would have a fold-out couch, so management sent up a roll-away bed within minutes. The entire staff was as helpful and friendly as they could be. The room was HUGE! A king-size bed with 2 sets of doors for privacy, a queen-size bed with an amazing ocean view, and a full-size kitchen with stove, fridge, and microwave. My boys (10, 8, 5 and 2) STILL had room to move around and not feel cramped in the room. They are also only a 3-4 minute walk from the boardwalk and pier. I will ONLY stay at the Boardwalk Inn on any future trips to Daytona!

Reviews.Title: “A GREAT PLACE TO STAY”
Reviews.Author: whynot1208
Reviews.Content: We have stayed here one or two times a year for about 4 years and this year was a real pleasant experience. The hotel has a new owner and he is really working hard to make the place a great vacation spot. The Hotel has all been repainted, new carpet, the pool is being reserviced as well as the parking lot, no more parking fee. I have to say to all of the people who have submitted poor reviews, give the Boardwalk another chance, I think you will be pleasantly surprised. We had a wonderful stay.

Reviews.Title: “DO NOT STAY HERE!!!!!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: mickstir59
Reviews.Content: I was in Daytona for one nite for Biketoberfest. The outside of the building looked nice so I decided to give it a try. There was a roaring noise in my room that the front desk said was the air condition unit. The front desk said that all the units did this. The mattress and pillowas were old and thin. I will not stay here again.

HotelInfo.Name: Boardwalk Inn and Suites
HotelInfo.Address: 301 South Atlantic Avenue, Daytona Beach, FL 32118
